title: tick board: explore spontaneous reordering
description: Sometimes ticks seem to reorder themselves in cols, sort order should be reasonably stable
notes: 2026-01-16 20:39 - Fixed by adding secondary sort by tick ID in app.js renderTicks(). Root cause: LoadTicksParallel uses concurrent goroutines with non-deterministic completion order, and frontend only sorted by priority. Now sorts by priority first, then by ID for ties. Commit: 935953f
closed_reason: Added secondary sort by tick ID in app.js to ensure stable ordering when priorities are equal. The issue was that LoadTicksParallel loads ticks concurrently with non-deterministic order, and the frontend sort only used priority which caused reordering for ticks with same priority.
